statements: SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT cart_id, customer_id, abandoned_at FROM abandoned_carts WHERE notification_sent = FALSE;
SELECT customer_id, cart_contents->'product_1' AS product_1 FROM abandoned_carts WHERE abandoned_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, abandoned_at FROM abandoned_carts WHERE cart_contents @> '{
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT cart_contents->'product_name' AS product_name, cart_contents->'quantity' AS quantity FROM abandoned_carts WHERE abandoned_at >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT cart_contents FROM abandoned_carts WHERE notification_sent = FALSE ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(cart_id) AS total_abandoned_carts FROM abandoned_carts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(cart_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE cart_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_id ASC, abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, shopping_cart_status FROM customers WHERE shopping_cart_status = 'active';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT cart_id, items_count, total_price FROM abandoned_carts WHERE total_price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, shopping_cart_status FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT cart_id, items_count, total_price, abandoned_at FROM abandoned_carts ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, items_count, total_price FROM customers JOIN abandoned_carts ON customers.customer_id = abandoned_carts.customer_id WHERE items_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM ShoppingCarts WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, notification_text FROM EmailNotifications ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ShoppingCarts WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT notification_text, sent_date FROM EmailNotifications WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers c JOIN EmailNotifications en ON c.customer_id = en.customer_id WHERE en.sent_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT c.name, s.total_amount, en.notification_text FROM Customers c JOIN ShoppingCarts s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id JOIN EmailNotifications en ON c.customer_id = en.customer_id WHERE s.total_amount > 500 AND en.sent_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_abandoned_carts FROM shopping_carts WHERE is_abandoned = TRUE GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT c.email_address, n.notification_text FROM customers c JOIN email_notifications n ON c.customer_id = n.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, total_price FROM shopping_carts WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE abandoned_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT notification_id, notification_text FROM email_notifications WHERE notification_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT cart_id, total_price FROM shopping_carts ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 2;
SELECT recipient_email, send_date FROM email_logs WHERE send_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT cart_id, total_price FROM shopping_carts WHERE total_price > 1000;
SELECT customers.customer_name, email_logs.recipient_email FROM customers JOIN email_logs ON customers.customer_id = email_logs.template_id;
SELECT * FROM email_templates WHERE template_content LIKE '%special offer%';
